title: Weekly Weather in 26 World Cities Ratio 4x
description: This is a variation of the Weekly Weather in 26 World Cities dataset. It is filtered to limit the history to be 4x the forecast length which is 13 time steps. This dataset spans 3 years and includes weekl weather measurements for 26 cities worldwide. It comprises 17 weather parameters, making it suitable for both multi-variate and single-series forecasting tasks. With data from January 2020 to December 2022, it's an ideal resource for forecasting the 'temperature' series while leveraging other weather measurements as potential exogenous factors.
